diff_analysis.evidence: The default DictCap was changed from (1<<31)-1 to 1<<31, which overflows a signed 32-bit int and can wrap to a negative value. This may cause the subsequent range check against MinDictCap/MaxDictCap to misbehave depending on their types and values, potentially allowing an effectively unbounded or invalid dictionary capacity, leading to uncontrolled resource allocation (CWE-770).
